package.name: HS.Ryu006 Fluid Widget
package.shortDescription: This is a Status Bar for XenHTML that gives you all details you need!

descriptionlist.description: This is a Status Bar for XenHTML that gives you all details you need!
It's available for both LS and HS. You can move it around but it's best to place it in Status Bar area. Make sure to hide your status bar first using SpringPlus tho or it won't look good.

screenshot.description: This is what you'll be getting.
This is how it'll look like on LS.
This is how it'll look like on HS.
